sentence.Network_en: They walked right into a booby-trap and got blown to smithereens.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们正好踩上了饵雷，结果被炸得粉身碎骨。

sentence.Network_en: She dropped the vase and smashed it to smithereens.
sentence.Network_cn: 她失手将花瓶摔得粉碎。

sentence.Network_en: The explosion blew the bridge to smithereens.
sentence.Network_cn: 炸药把这座桥炸得粉碎.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 最有意义的英语单词 - no的日志 - 网易博客 ... 47. delicacy 精美 60. smithereens 碎片 61. hi 打招呼，引起注意.

list.abs: It should be smashed to smithereens ., 应当彻底摧毁.
the task was to blow the house smithereens .任务就是把它炸成碎片。
帝国时代II:征服者(Age of Empires II:The Conquerors)作弊码:  WOOF WOOF ...HOW DO YOU TURN THIS ON 得到一个Cobera TO SMITHEREENS 得到一个破坏者.
so many houses were been blown to smithereens in the war .在战争期间，很多房子都被炸成废墟。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: probably from Irish smidirín

entry.def: If something is smashed or blown to smithereens, it breaks into very small pieces.

example.ex: She dropped the vase and smashed it to smithereens...
example.tran: 她失手将花瓶摔得粉碎。

example.ex: They walked right into a booby-trap and got blown to smithereens.
example.tran: 他们正好踩上了饵雷，结果被炸得粉身碎骨。

means.word_mean: 1. a collection of small fragments considered as a whole;

sentences.sentence: "I wanted to smash him to smithereens"
"the toilet bowl ws blown to smitereens"
